row.process:
:SET &STATUS# = GET_UC_OBJECT_STATUS(,,"RETCODE") :SET &UC4RB_XML_ATTR_VALUE# = ""
:IF &STATUS# EQ 0 : SET &HND# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT("JOBS",, "REP","XML-GetAttribute-Result*","COL=DELIMITER", 'DELIMITER=*:') : PROCESS &HND# : SET &KEY# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,1) : SET &VALUE# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,2) : IF &KEY# EQ "XML-GetAttribute-Result" : SET &UC4RB_XML_ATTR_VALUE# = "&VALUE#" : ENDIF : ENDPROCESS : CLOSE_PROCESS &HND# :ENDIF
:PUBLISH &UC4RB_XML_ATTR_VALUE#,,"WORKFLOW"
